Package emissary.place

Class ServiceProviderRefreshablePlace

  • java.lang.Object
    • emissary.directory.DirectoryProviderPlace
      • emissary.place.ServiceProviderPlace
        • emissary.place.ServiceProviderRefreshablePlace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServiceProviderPlace, ServiceProviderPlaceMBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RefreshablePlace
    public abstract class ServiceProviderRefreshablePlace
extends ServiceProviderPlace
    ServiceProviderPlace that supports on-demand refresh of its configuration

      • ServiceProviderRefreshablePlace

        public ServiceProviderRefreshablePlace​(ServiceProviderRefreshablePlace place,
                                       boolean register)
                                throws IOException
        Refresh specific constructor, basically clones a place and swaps out the Namespace ref
        Parameters:
        place - the ServiceProviderRefreshablePlace to clone
        register - set true to register with directory place, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an issue trying to create the place

    • Method Detail

      • setupPlace

        protected void setupPlace​(@Nullable
                          String theDir,
                          String placeLocation,
                          boolean register)
                   throws IOException
        Description copied from class: ServiceProviderPlace
        Help the constructor get the place running
        Overrides:
        setupPlace in class ServiceProviderPlace
        Parameters:
        theDir - key for the directory to use, if null will look up default name
        placeLocation - string name of our location
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isInvalidated

        public final boolean isInvalidated()
        Get the invalid flag of the place. An invalidated place may indicate that the place has changes, such as new configuration, and may trigger a follow-on process to reconfigure, reinitialize, or re-create the place.
        Returns:
        true if the place has been invalidated, false otherwise

      • invalidate

        public final void invalidate()
        Invalidate a place that need to be refreshed.

      • invalidate

        public final void invalidate​(String reason)
        Invalidate a place that need to be refreshed.
        Parameters:
        reason - an optional reason for place invalidation

      • refresh

        public final void refresh()
        Reinitialize the place by reloading the configurator and reconfiguring the place. Must call invalidate() before attempting to refresh the place.

      • refresh

        public final void refresh​(boolean full)
        Reinitialize the place by reloading the configurator and reconfiguring the place. Must call invalidate() before attempting to refresh the place.
        Parameters:
        full - true unbind from the namespace and rebuild all directory keys, false to reuse existing keys and just refresh place configs

      • refresh

        public final void refresh​(boolean full,
                          boolean silent)
        Reinitialize the place by reloading the configurator and reconfiguring the place. Must call invalidate() before attempting to refresh the place.
        Parameters:
        full - true unbind from the namespace and rebuild all directory keys, false to reuse existing keys and just refresh place configs
        silent - true to just log any issues that arise, false to throw runtime exceptions
